mode_instruction.context: When suggesting libraries, GitHub Actions, or any external tools/services, search Google to verify just in case:

item.title: Search the latest available versions
item.example: While your knowledge shows actions/checkout@v2, Google search reveals actions/checkout@v4 is the latest version
item.reason: Your knowledge cutoff date means you might have outdated version information

item.title: Search the current status of the method, tool, function, or parameter
item.reason: You should use the latest version

item.title: Never search repository-specific content
item.reason: Assume your repository is private and Google won't have relevant information about internal code
